RenterID

Facilitates a global renter identity.
Providing security, transparency and privacy
Verified by your network and third-parties
Project Project Papers Papers Core Core Token Sale Token Sale Team Team

RenterIQ

A store of renter behaviour.
Tracks current and historical rental information
Fuels the RenterScore
Project Project Papers Papers Core Core Token Sale Token Sale Team Team

RenterScore

A metric of renter trustworthiness.
Determined by a dynamic algorithm fueled by RenterIQ.
Open source, transparent, community-driven, universal, adaptable.

The means to transact in and incentivize the ecosystem.
